operations.content:
version: '3'
scenarios:
  - name: /api/import.php
    events:
      - event_type: http_request
        url: /api/import.php
        method: POST
        status_code: 200
      - event_type: http_request
        url: /api/import.php
        method: PUT
        status_code: 200
